We’re on the turn heads-up with 1.67-to-1 pot.  
– I flopped top pair with one of my 7’s on a draw-heavy board (9♣-8♥ = open-ender).  
– Opponent checked both the flop and the turn, showing weakness.  
Most of their hands (over-cards, missed bluffs) probably won’t pay off a big bet, but                                a reasonable turn stab should often fold them out right now.

Since the effective stack is still ~830 chips I want to apply pressure without over-committing.

[Bet 80]
